getToken:
mutation getToken($username: String!, $password: String!) {
  getToken(username: $username, password: $password, app_client: 1) {
    token
    user {
      id
      phone
      nick_name
      real_name
      avatar
      create_time
      need_login_verify
      role
      company_id
      company_slug
      shop_ids
      company {
        id
        name
        logo
      }
      new_permissions
      roles {
        id
        name
        description
        create_time
        role_type
        permissions {
          id
          name
          description
          method
          status
          create_time
        }
      }
      shop_ids
      company_list
    }
    auth {
      tabs {
        id
        name
        path
        sort
        icon
        is_nav
        parent_id
        app_id
        parent_app
      }
      employee_id
      is_super
      is_admin
      is_wanning
    }
  }
}
